text: I was just telling Emily that powerful people should be *scared* of the team we’re putting together.
author: Ryanj899

text: Holy cow, there are so many ridiculously talented investigative reporters in this country, bent on serving the public interest. The applications for @PacificStand’s accountability reporter position are truly spectacular. I wish I could hire everyone.
author: Ryanj899

text: stoked to see @amshulman's review of THE TRUFFLE UNDERGROUND on @goodreads today. you'll be able to read answers to his really smart questions about the book at @LAReviewofBooks closer to pub day (6/4). stay tuned! and pre-order here: https://www.indiebound.org/book/9780451495693 …
author: Ryanj899

text: Pretty excited. The very talented @sophiemurguia and @jonahshai started today at @PacificStand, which means the investigations desk is truly up and running. we'll be accepting applications for the accountability reporter spot for the next couple weeks:
author: Ryanj899
